name: World Cricket Championship 3
description:
WCC3 is a next-gen sequel to the World’s No. 1 mobile cricket game - World Cricket Championship 2 (WCC2), the most downloaded & awarded game. WCC3 takes the excitement of realism in mobile cricket a notch higher with cutting edge gameplay features, brand new controls, multiplayer, professional commentary, exciting animations, real-time motion capture of professional cricketers, & advanced AI. The most realistic cricket game on a phone! WCC3 is a game by cricket lovers for cricket lovers!

Get immersed fully into the spirit of cricket!
• Hundreds of full motion-captured batting, bowling & fielding actions.
• Professional commentary from Australian cricket legend Matthew Hayden & India’s popular cricketer & top commentator Aakash Chopra.
• Brand new hand-crafted Stadiums, lighting & pitches.
• Tournament formats - World Cup, Tri Series, ODIs, Ashes, Test Cricket, World Tour, Hot Events & more!
• All new NPL, with auctions & realistic gameplay
• Dynamic AI that scales according to your skill level.
• Cricket grounds of different dimensions.

All-new Career Mode!
• Advance your cricket journey through domestic, league & international matches.
• Play over 400 matches, spanning 25 series across 3 brackets in various formats.
• Enjoy stunning visual cutscenes that convey your story contextually at every stage.
• Make tactical decisions in match selection, gear choices, & ability upgrades.

Build & manage your own team!
• Form your ultimate team as a cricket team captain, manager, player, and coach.
• Player Upgrade Cards improve your individual Squad members across 18 disciplines.
• Create & customize your Squad with specialist batsmen, devastating bowlers & versatile all-rounders.

Exhilarating batting, bowling & fielding simulation!
• All new intuitive & fluid controls.
• All new batting shots and exciting new mechanics.
• Brand new Run, Sprint & Dive mechanics.
• Special deliveries that can devastate the batting side.
• Fielder controls for the first time! Make unbelievable dive stops, direct hits & athletic throws.
• Multiple camera & control options.

Compete & rise in the ranks!
• The League of Champs will test your skills & pit you against other players for supremacy.
• Rise & conquer an all new hypercompetitive leaderboard to claim greater rewards.
• Seasonal challenges & regular contests push you to greater heights of glory & give you stunningly entertaining gaming sessions.
• All new progression through 50 epic Badges of merit from “Vulnerable” to “Godly” that showcase your prowess to other players.
• Earn Platinum from challenging new Daily Missions that push you to the limits.
• Win exciting drops and loot in Kits graded through Common, Uncommon, Rare, Epic & Legendary!
• Face off against other players in gritty multiplayer modes for the ultimate test of skill.
Get right into the action for a holistic mobile cricketing experience.

By subscribing to the Legendary VIP Pass for Rs.499 a month, you get:
